attributes.action: Following Cummins testimony we need a public enquiry to start immediately
attributes.additional_details: Those in goverment need to answer questions from an independent judicial enquiry now
attributes.background: We cannot wait two years or for results to be published after the next election. Those in goverment need to answer questions from an independent judicial enquiry now..

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Launch a judge-led public inquiry into the Covid-19 pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577292

Ensure the public inquiry into Covid-19 reports before the next General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585861

Start the independent inquiry on UK Government decisions during Covid pandemic.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587338
